synopsis.text:
Interactive and immersive, "Attraction" is an innovative anime film directed by the renowned Koji Morimoto of Studio 4Â°C. The anime follows the story of a young boy, Hiro, who, along with his friends Ren and Koichi, stumbles upon a peculiar lighter. Their curiosity piqued, the trio follows the lighter's cryptic instructions, leading them to a vibrant underground nightclub. Here, they are enticed with the allure of popularity and the fulfillment of their deepest desires, all for the price of a single cigarette. As the boys grapple with temptation, the question arises: will they manage to escape the club before succumbing to the lure of smoking?

"Attraction" is not just an anime but an interactive experience, utilizing the viewer's webcam to allow exploration within the film. Viewers can interact with objects, eavesdrop on conversations, and more, creating a unique and engaging viewing experience. Commissioned by INPES, this anime serves as a powerful anti-smoking message aimed at discouraging potential first-time smokers. Available in Japanese, English, and French, "Attraction" is a captivating blend of storytelling and technology that promises to leave a lasting impression.
